title: The Whistle  | 3
description:
Noah and Sara, now separated, are each forced to dive deeper into the mysteries of the underground labyrinth meeting some unexpected obstacles along the way. The Narrator struggles to make sense of what exactly Noah and Sara are up against.
CAST
Narrator – Mike Howorun
Noah – Brady Roberts
Sara – Greta Carew-Johns
Men's Choir: Steve Sauve, Zach Marchand, Brian Halpin, Matthew Hall
Editing and Sound Design – Matthew Hall & Mike Howorun
Post Production Producer - Rob Johnston
Written/Directed – Mike Howorun
Produced by - Matthew Hall, Brady Roberts, Mike Howorun, Dila Velazquez
Created by Mike Howorun & Brady Roberts
Contact: escapingdenverpod@gmail.com 
Instagram: @escapingdenver
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
